fulltext:
ALEX NGUYEN 
1 
NGUYỄN ĐẶNG VIẾT VĂN (ALEX NGUYEN) 
 
Birthday: Jun 19, 1993 
 
Address: 146/59/11 Vu Tung, Ward 2, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City 
 
Phone: (+84)-909-143-941  
 
Email: nguyendangvietvan@gmail.com 
 
Skype: vannguyen196 
Summary 
 
Three years’ experience on Manual and Automation testing on Web, Desktop application. 
 
Solid understanding of defect development life cycle.  
 
Good knowledge in object oriented programming and databases transaction. 
 
Excellent teamwork and communication skills. 
 
Experience about working oversea (Korea, Greece, Taiwan). 
 
Manual Testing: 
o 
Takes the responsibility to create test case and test plan, prepare test environment, 
controlling defect life cycle and experience on onsite support for UAT and Roll-Out the 
system. 
o 
Estimate effort, define schedule, assign daily task and control testing status. 
o 
Training for new team member, strong skill in problem solving, 
o 
Communicate and adapt with new environment and technology quickly. 
 
Automation Testing: 
o 
Experience in Object Oriented Programming with Java and C# and always tries to 
develop tool to support the testing. 
o 
Takes the responsibility to creating and updating test scripts, maintain framework, 
execute the regression test, analyze and report the testing result. 
Work Experience 
I. 
Quality Assurance – TSB VIETNAM CO. LTD (Jun 2016 - current) 
 
Total Soft Bank Ltd, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. The Production Company provides IT solutions 
in Port Logistics and Maritime industry. 
1. 
CATOS for Wan Hai Line Terminal (Kaohsiung, Taichung) 
2. 
CATOS for Thessaloniki Port Authority. 
ALEX NGUYEN 
2 
Role: SQA/ On-site supporter 
 
Build Test Scenario, Test Case documents. 
 
Check issues, verify and deploy new releases onto UAT environment. 
 
Integration Test between CATOS and TML system 
 
Work on-site with Project Managers, Business Analyst and Development Team of Korea. 
 
Work directly with end-user in Taiwan/Greece and provide workaround solutions. 
 
Technical support, troubleshoot, solve problem and explain CATOS’s business rules for end-
user during UAT. 
 
Support super user-training, create manual guideline documents 
 
Support offsite, remote to user workstation for checking error on UAT database. 
3. 
CATOS maintenance for Spain Clients (MSC Valencia Terminal) 
Role: SQA/ Off-site Supporter 
Manual: 
 
Monitored issues on Mantis bug tracking tool and kept track of working progress with 
development team.  
 
Coordinated with development team to reproduce issue and clarify scope of testing. 
 
Built Test documentation: test scenarios and test cases based on issue requirement. 
 
Clarify user requirements, database modification for new Change Request. 
 
Update new patch files and deploy environment. 
Automation: 
 
Use Coded UI tool to run Regression testing. 
 
Debug modify and verify scripts base on test cases. 
 
Define, implement, and analyze metrics to determine test effectiveness and the overall 
quality of software. 
 
Report and manage bugs found while testing. 
 
Control quality output for every single release. 
II. 
Quality Assurance – Play Fury Vietnam Ltd (Jan 2016 – May 2016) 
 
Play Fury Vietnam Ltd. The Production Company provides games mobile, token services, healthy 
solutions… of Singapore. 
ALEX NGUYEN 
3 
1. 
Mobile Doctor – Nightingales (Start-up) 
Role: QA Engineer 
 
Design and run Test Cases. 
 
Report bugs to Mantis. 
 
Discuss with Manager about change functions, update features, UI… 
 
Transfer with Developers to make sure them understand clearly new/change requirements. 
 
Check responsible UI of Nightingales website. 
 
Functional test Android app, Braintree/Dashboard web. 
Technical Skills  
 
Programming languages: C#, Java.  
 
Automation tools: Coded UI, Selenium IDE.  
 
Database: Oracle, MSSQL.  
 
Other tools: Virtual Box, VMware, StarTeam, Toad Oracle, Window Server…  
 
Software development methodologies: Waterfall, Scrum. 
 
Software development process: ISO, CMMI 
Soft Skills 
 
Problem solving 
 
Organizing communication 
 
Self-confidence, creative 
 
Work well under high pressure 
 
Coaching co-worker teamwork 
Education 
Van Lang University, Ho Chi Minh city, Viet Nam (Sep 2011 – Mar 2016) 
Major: Software Engineering 
Projects: 
 
Oct 2015 – Mar 2016: Lunch Booking System 
 
Mar 2015 – Sep 2015: Network Monitoring System 
 
Mar 2014 – Jun 2014: Point Of Sale System  
ALEX NGUYEN 
4 
Award Certificates 
 
2012:   Introduction Software Engineering of CMU 
Introduction to Network of CMU 
 
2013:   Application Development Practice of CMU 
 
2018:   Introduction to Containerisation of J&S MARITIME .LTD
